title: Foi no mato pegar madeira boa

lines.br: Foi no mato pegar madeira boa
lines.en: I went to the woods to take good wood.

lines.br: Foi no mato pegar madeira boa
lines.en: I went to the woods to take good wood.
In order to make my berimbau
In order to make my berimbau
For the roda to be good
For the roda to be good
It was my mestre who taught me
It was my mestre who taught me
